mapper.select: select qb.id, qb.type, qb.answer, qb.question,qb.model_id as modelId, qb.category_id as categoryId, qb.created_at as createdAt, qb.updated_at as updatedAt from question_back qb inner join question_back_assignment qba on qba.question_id ::uuid = qb.id where qba.assignment_id =#{assignmentId};

select ci.status = 0 from question_back_assignment qba inner join assignment a on a.id = qba.assignment_id ::uuid inner join course_chapter_section ccs on ccs.section_id = a.section_id ::uuid inner join course ci on ci.id = ccs.course_id where a.id =#{id}::uuid;
